long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here you will find the latest 100% Royalty Free Rap Instrumentals produced by The Corporatethief Beats aka Daniel Hartnett. Here will also be able to record a test free style using the embed able audio recorder.  

At the bottom of this Chrome extension you will find the most useful resources to help you write rap lyrics, to help you over come rap writer's block and to assist you with learn how to freestyle rap. 

Features & Benefits 
- New Royalty Free Beats 2022
- Embed-able Recorder To Test Your Freestyles
- Over 200+ Rap Instrumentals, Trap Beats, Rap Beats , Beats With Hooks and Type Beats.
- Beat Packs {Pay What You Can Offer's}
- Rap Resources 
          - How To Over Rap Writer's Block Course
          - Link To The Best Rap Lyrics Assistant 
          - Link How To Freestyle Rap Course
          - Link To Hip Hop Lyrics Guide.

I started The Corporatethief Beats website back in 2010 to showcase my beats and my music marketing advice. We create trap beats, hip hop beats, beats with hooks, west coast beats, pop beats and new school type beats. Visit our beat store here. 

This blog is aimed at helping you increase the number of visitors to your music. To help you learn and grow with the aid of my online marketing experience. This is my music marketing guide for rap artists.

To show you the essential tools and techniques. These tools and tips will help you get the best outcome from the promotion of your mixtape, album or single online.
